sentences.sentence: These forces will lead to cleaner factories, producing better goods at lower prices, personalised to our individual needs and desires.
sentences.translation: 这些动力会带来更干净的工厂，生产出更高性价比的产品，满足我们的个人需求并达成我们的愿望。

sentences.sentence: The dream of personalised flight is still vivid in the minds of many inventors, some developing cycle-powered craft, others pouring money into jetpacks.
sentences.translation: 个人飞行的梦想在许多发明家的脑海中仍然鲜活生动，一些人开发循环动力飞行器，另一些人则往喷气背包上大量投入资金。

sentences.sentence: PERSONALISED medicine offers a huge promise.
sentences.translation: 个人专属药品的前景非常光明。
